author: Unity
description:
Most studios start with a pitch deck. We started in the YouTube comments. This talk shares how we grew Fateless from a gaming community into a full studio with $14M raised and hundreds of thousands of players—before launch. By building in public and involving fans from day one, we turned transparency into traction. Ideal for devs, creators, and founders, this session offers real-world lessons on how to build smarter, faster, and community-first.

#Unity #Unite2025 #VR
title: Building a $14M community: How we built a studio backwards (and why it worked) | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
Order 13, our game that released on March 10, was made with Unity in about 3.5 months. The game has sold 50K copies in its first two months. This talk is about the new reality of indie game development and how people can have a successful PC game on Steam in a short amount of time.

#Unity #Unite2025 #GameDev
title: How we created and marketed a successful game in 3.5 months using the Unity Engine | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description: Songs of Silence is a cross-platform strategy game that’s known for its art-nouveau style. It features a range of graphics features, from classic Fog of War to the corrupting "Silence," and dynamic grass deformation. In this talk, I’ll walk you through the technical creation of these effects. We’ll cover the shaders, render passes, dynamic texture masks, and how to integrate them into the URP. We’ll also touch on GPU debugging, mesh generation, and other implementation details.
title: Rendering the silence: Advanced graphics techniques in Songs of Silence | Unite 2025

author: Unity
description:
As a lead software engineer at Ubisoft, I’ve spent the past several years helping multiple mobile game teams worldwide work more efficiently and collaboratively. In this talk, I’ll share how my experience building and maintaining Unity plugins and SDKs has shaped our approach to reusing technology internally, the best practices that emerged along the way, and the common challenges we’ve learned to solve when supporting diverse teams and projects.

#Unity #Unite2025 #UnityEngine
title: Reusable technology: Saving development time with shared Unity plug-ins and SDKs | Unite 2025
